ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Probably pointless
ygData.msgSnippet: Great post!! There is a bard thread that Abashi has started (and if you haven t heard of it yet, shame on you for not keeping up on your EQ studies ;p) on the
ygData.messageBody:
Great post!!

There is a bard thread that Abashi has started (and if you haven't heard of
it yet, shame on you for not keeping up on your EQ studies ;p) on the
Gameplay forum. Currently, it's into it's 10th page, over 350 posts (and
growing), and has yet to leave the 1st page of the forum.. Please support
the bardic community by posting there (not looking for bumps or flames, but
more discussion).

Also, check out the latest Daily Screenshot at EQVault featuring Yours Truly
;o) (Thanks again to Chillsy over at the Concert Hall boards for the sign).

-=B=-
41.75
The Rathe
